page.title: 01LIVING IN LUDWORTH
page.content: Ludworth is a popular place, with those who live there.Most people like it because it is a small friendly village surrounded by countryside. The general dealer, newsagent and post office supply most needs but not all. Most people like Ludworth but some complain about things such as stray dogs and vandelism. The bus service is not as good as it used to be especially at night, but some people don't use it.Older people don't go out of the village a lot but many younger people do. Most people went to Ludworth school. Anyone over fifty to the old Ludworth School, as the present school was not built until the 1930's Of a population of about 2000, more than half are over 35 years old.
